text: Nyagasani wacu! Mu by’ukuri, natuje rumwe mu rubyaro rwanjye (Isimayili na nyina Hajar) mu kibaya kidahingwa, hafi y’ingoro yawe ntagatifu, Nyagasani wacu, kugira ngo bahozeho amasengesho. Bityo, shyira urukundo mu mitima y’abantu babakunde, kandi unabahe amafunguro kugira ngo babashe gushimira
